item.title: About
item.description: Hi there üëã Welcome to my blog! My name is Vu and I’m currently a third-year student at VNUHCM - University of Science. My major is Computer Science and I’m interested in Mathematics, Machine Learning and Deep Learning ü§ñ. This blog is created with my willing to share the knowledge to others about many wonderful things in Artificial Intelligence. At this time, the main language I use in almost posts will be Vietnamese.
